attributes.action: GMC to Pay the fee of Solicitor/Barrister to represent them in MPT Hearing
attributes.additional_details:
If this policy gets implemented then GMC will  start following its own guidelines (because it will save their money going to the  pockets of law professionals) of local resolution of the concerns first before accepting the referral.
It will save the time as well huge stress for patients and doctors. During long investigstions (According  to GMC , most of the referrals results no action on doctor's registration), public is deprived of services of doctor in already understaffed NHS therefore it is not at all in the best interest of public
attributes.background: GMC should also pay for the legal representation of doctors in MPT HEARING because we have been paying  for our subscription and GMC Claims that they support the doctors.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the GMC, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. The GMC is an independent body.
